member.name: POINTFX
member.summary: The POINTFX structure contains the coordinates of points that describe the outline of a character in a TrueType font.

member.name: POINTFX.x
member.summary: The x-component of a point on the outline of a TrueType character.

member.name: POINTFX.y
member.summary: The y-component of a point on the outline of a TrueType character.
